page.title: 09A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY a.m.
page.content: The day starts at 7.00am. After a wash I change into my uniform. After having breakfast and washing up I watch 'Breakfast Time' a TV programme. It is soon time to leave for school. The bus comes at about 8.45am. I arrive at school in time for registration, 8.55. The assembly lasts for about 25 minutes. On Fridays, the whole school is in the hall. It is quite crowded with many rows of chairs and benches. Our school is quite small with about 300 pupils. It is dark in there, the electric lights give it a yellow haze. I'm in the 4th year and so I sit near the back, while the 1st years are on the benches at the front. Following assembly we have Art and after break, which lasts 15 minutes, we have P.E. During Lunch Break we often have games practises; these are usually House or Year teams.
